item.title: OSCR Member: Gabriele Paolacci
item.description: Description My research considers both substantive and methodological questions in behavioral research. I conduct experiments to study whether and how peopleâ€™s decisions (e.g., what to buy, whom to donate) deviate from the prescriptions of rational choice theory and consequentialist philosophy. I also do research into the methodology of data collection in the behavioral sciences, and in particular the use of online samples (e.g., MTurk). CV and Contact Info Click on the picture to send an email.
